alert.note: Alert for Siskiyou (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 3:51PM PDT until June 25 at 4:15PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: The National Weather Service in Medford has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Siskiyou County in northern California... * Until 415 PM PDT. * At 351 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Somes Bar, or 13 miles northeast of Orleans, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Siskiyou County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
